Dallas Mayor Tom Tom Leppert says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this year, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation. Wife, Karen; three children U.S. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana.
